name: Salon World Safety Face Shields - Ultra Clear Protective Full Face Shields to Protect Eyes, Nose and Mouth - Anti-Fog PET Plastic, Elastic Headband - Sanitary Droplet Splash Guard Cover (Pack of 4)
short_description: 4 Pack of Comfortable Face Shields: Sanitary, durable, lightweight, and comfortable premium protective face shields that are made with ultra-clear thick plastic. Each shield contains an elastic headband and a soft, comfortable forehead foam pad. The shields have enough space between the face to accommodate the use of masks, eyeglasses, and hats. One size fits all.

Full Face Protection: Safety full-length face shield with a flexible wrap-around design that provides over-the-forehead, side, and front face protection. The shields have 180 degrees of protection and provide full coverage of the eyes, nose, and mouth to help prevent droplets of saliva, coughs, sneezes, and other foreign substances from reaching your face. Dimensions: 8.7" high x 12.6" wide.

Ultra-Clear and Anti-Fogging: Face shields provide super clear visibility and have superior optics that let in the maximum amount of light, while the anti-fogging material resists fog under extended use. The shield is crystal clear, after peeling off both layers of the protective film. Reusable after disinfecting.

Ideal for Most Workplaces Our essential personal protective face shields are worn all over the world in most common workplace environments. They are used by Hair Salons and Spa Professionals, Restaurant, Food Services, Retailers, Warehouses, Offices, Schools, both Indoors and Outdoors.

name: ARCCAPTAIN Anti-Fog Panoramic Full Face Shield, Clear Polycarbonate Full Face Mask with Impact Protection and Adjustable Ratcheting Headgear, ANSI Z87.1 Certified for Grinding and Cutting
short_description: Industrial-Grade Protection – Designed for demanding worksites, this full-face safety shield delivers complete coverage against sparks, debris, and high-impact hazards. ANSI Z87.1+ certified for professional use.

Enhanced Visual Clarity – Equipped with an advanced anti-fog coating, this visor prevents condensation build-up even during heavy grinding or in high-humidity environments. The scratch-resistant polycarbonate lens maintains long-lasting clarity while also blocking harmful UV rays.
Precision Fit Adjustment – Ratcheting headgear with smooth-turn dial provides a secure, customizable fit. Multi-angle tilt design allows optimal positioning for different applications.
Comfort for Long Shifts – Lightweight, balanced construction with soft sweat-absorbing headband reduces pressure and fatigue, making it suitable for extended wear.
Built for Reliability – Manufactured with durable polycarbonate and reinforced components, this face shield is engineered to withstand tough industrial conditions and frequent daily use.

name: Face Shield, Full Face Safety Shield for Grinding & Cutting, ANSI Z87.1 Tested, Replaceable Clear & Mesh Visor, Adjustable Headgear for Woodworking, Chainsaw & Workshop Use
short_description: Full Face Safety Protection:This full face safety shield provides complete coverage for the face and chin, helping reduce exposure to flying debris, dust, and splashes during general industrial, workshop, and home improvement tasks.

Tested to ANSI Z87.1 Impact Standard – The clear visor has been tested according to the ANSI Z87.1 standard to help protect against flying debris, metal fragments, wood chips, and dust during grinding, cutting, and industrial tasks.

Dual Visor Design: Clear & Mesh Options:Includes a replaceable clear visor and a mesh screen visor to support different working needs. The clear visor offers full visibility, while the mesh visor improves airflow and comfort during outdoor or warm conditions.
Adjustable Headgear for Comfortable Fit:Features an adjustable headgear system designed to fit most head sizes securely. Lightweight structure helps maintain comfort during extended use.

Durable & Reusable Construction:Built with a sturdy frame and replaceable visor system for long-term use. Ideal for workshops, yard work, chainsaw operation, and general safety applications. Not a respirator. Not intended for medical or certified industrial protection.
